name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit; echo 'âœ… Packages installed and Requirements met'
postCreateCommand: curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_16.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs && cd /mount/src/gan-inpaintingapp/streamlit_drawable_canvas/frontend && npm install && npm run build && ls /mount/src/gan-inpaintingapp/streamlit_drawable_canvas/frontend/build

postAttachCommand.server: cd /mount/src/gan-inpaintingapp/streamlit_drawable_canvas/frontend && npm run start & cd /mount/src/gan-inpaintingapp && until [ -d /mount/src/gan-inpaintingapp/streamlit_drawable_canvas/frontend/build ]; do sleep 1; done && streamlit run MainApp.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
